text: @BillGates Bill, we have the solution to safely re-open the economy at the same time eradicate coronavirus within the U.S.  We need your help to propagate Far-UV Excimer Wave Sterilray technology.  A disruptive technology with significant global implications.  Visit https://t.co/BBkrUVE5X2.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
